# Intro
Obter o layout da rede no RedeR
```{r message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(readr)
library(igraph)
library(magrittr)
```

# Dados
```{r rows.print=5}
data(
  gene_ids,
  pathway_neuroexclusivity,
  expression_neuroexclusivity,
  string_edgelist,
  layout,
  package = "neurotransmission"
)
```

## Rotação
```{r}
#matriz de rotacao
angle <- 90*(pi/180)
rotm <- matrix(c(cos(angle),sin(angle),-sin(angle),cos(angle)),ncol=2)
#rotacao
layout <- t(rotm %*% (t(layout)))
```

# RedeR
```{r}
vertices <- gene_ids %>%
  na.omit %>%
  inner_join(pathway_neuroexclusivity) %>%
  inner_join(expression_neuroexclusivity) %>%
  select(name = string_id, pathway_neuroexclusivity, expression_neuroexclusivity)

g <- graph_from_data_frame(string_edgelist, directed = F, vertices = vertices)

V(g)$x <- -layout[, 1]
V(g)$y <- -layout[, 2]

subgraphs <- decompose.graph(g)
lcc_index <- which.max(sapply(subgraphs, vcount))
lcc <- subgraphs[[lcc_index]]
```

# Force
```{r echo=T, eval=T, include=FALSE}
pajek_nodes <- as_data_frame(lcc, what = "vertices") %>%
  select(name, signal = pathway_neuroexclusivity, x, y)

pajek_edges <- igraph::as_data_frame(lcc, what = "edges")

range(pajek_nodes$x) %>% print
range(pajek_nodes$y) %>% print

hack <- tribble(
  ~name, ~signal, ~x,       ~y,
  "bot", 0,       -42 - 50, -483 - 50,
  "top", 0,       445 + 50,  -22 + 50
)

pajek_nodes %<>% bind_rows(hack) %>% mutate(id = row_number())
```

# Output
```{r}
write("*edges", file="viacomplex.net")
write_tsv(pajek_edges, "viacomplex.net", append = TRUE, col_names = FALSE, quote_escape = F)
write("*nodes", file="viacomplex.net", append = TRUE)
write_tsv(pajek_nodes %>% select(name, x, y), "viacomplex.net", append = TRUE, col_names = FALSE, quote_escape = F)

write_tsv(pajek_nodes %>% select(id, name, signal), "kegg.dat")
```

# Force
```{r echo=T, eval=T, include=FALSE}
pajek_nodes <- as_data_frame(lcc, what = "vertices") %>%
  select(name, signal = expression_neuroexclusivity, x, y)

pajek_nodes %<>% bind_rows(hack) %>% mutate(id = row_number())

write_tsv(pajek_nodes %>% select(id, name, signal), "gxa.dat")
```
